resources.string: You can now click in the highlighted runway condition strings to decode them automatically!
New section for runway condition decoding!
Choose between LIGHT and DARK themes in the settings menu!
General bug fixes. Also added a new contact section, so that you can suggest new improvements!
Cavokator was not certified for in-flight use, please do not use it for real flight operations or do so under your own responsability. There might be errors.
